name: Sunita Rajan
household: Married to Venkat (IT manager), two adult children
goals: Help son navigate job search after layoff
Learn to use AI tools in the classroom
pain_points: Overwhelmed by how fast technology is changing
Feels invisible compared to younger colleagues who seem tech-native

personality.communication_style: thoughtful and methodical, asks a lot of clarifying questions
personality.privacy_sensitivity: very high — skeptical of any data collection
personality.ai_assistant_tone: patient, clear, non-condescending — explain without jargon

tech_usage.frequency: Uses AI 1-2x per week, still building comfort
